metadata.Title: CVE-2022-41981 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description: A stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the TGA file format parser of OpenImageIO v2.3.19.0. A specially-crafted targa file can lead to out of bounds read and write on the process stack, which can lead to arbitrary code execution. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: openimageio package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
